about_the_game:
Imagine your life in our COLONY on MARS. Imagine all that you could achieve on MARS!

Mars Clicker is a game where you embark on a mission to accumulate a gigantic amount of crystals on Mars. To help you on this adventure, you can unlock and upgrade a variety of Martian buildings, from simple mines and mining plants to advanced technologies and mysterious alien structures - you'll even have the chance to investigate the enigmatic dark matter to boost your progress!

- Gather crystals and use them to produce even more crystals

- Research dark matter to unlock new powers

- Recruit mining robots and Martian entities

- Unlock permanent upgrades

- Immersive soundtrack

And remember, if you ever think you're being exploited, just look at the Martian horizon... there's no escape.
